verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had given <S%H5117>rest<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> waxed <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for their <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and for their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and for their <S%H8199>judges,<s%> and for their <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, I am <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age:<s%>

And you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of you; for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is he that has <S%H3898>fought<s%> for you.

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5307>divided<s%> to you by lot <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7604>remain,<s%> to be an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> from <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that I have <S%H3772>cut<s%> off, even to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3996>westward.<s%> <S%H8121><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> he shall <S%H1920>expel<s%> them from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and <S%H3423>drive<s%> them from out of your <S%H6440>sight;<s%> and you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H776>land,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>promised<s%> to you.

Be you therefore <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2388>courageous<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> that you <S%H5493>turn<s%> not aside therefrom to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left;<s%>

That you <S%H935>come<s%> not among <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%> among you; <S%H3808>neither<s%> make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> cause to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7812>bow<s%> yourselves to them:
But <S%H1692>hold<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3423>driven<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H6099>strong:<s%> but as for you, <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> has been <S%H5975>able<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of you shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H505>thousand:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> he it is that <S%H3898>fights<s%> for you, as he has <S%H1696>promised<s%> you.
Take <S%H3966>good<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> therefore to <S%H5315>yourselves,<s%> that you <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>Else<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you do in any wise <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> and <S%H1692>join<s%> to the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> even <S%H428>these<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> you, and shall make <S%H2859>marriages<s%> with them, and <S%H935>go<s%> in to them, and they to you:

<S%H3045>Know<s%> for a certainty that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H3423>drive<s%> out any of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you; but they shall be <S%H6341>snares<s%> and <S%H4170>traps<s%> to you, and <S%H7850>scourges<s%> in your <S%H6654>sides,<s%> and <S%H6796>thorns<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H6>perish<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> I am <S%H1980>going<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and you <S%H3045>know<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>souls,<s%> that not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> has <S%H5307>failed<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you; <S%H3605>all<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> to pass to you, and not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> has <S%H5307>failed<s%> thereof.

Therefore it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that as <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> on you, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%> you; <S%H3651>so<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> on you <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you from <S%H5921>off<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

When you have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, and have <S%H1980>gone<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> yourselves to them; then shall the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and you shall <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H5414>given<s%> to you.
